Html:
Hi Agustin,

I want to trigger an event in Prism 4 framework with MVVM pattern. Can you please tell me how to call the events like click etc...? .  If sample provided the solution is much appreciated.

Thanks and Regards,

Sakthi

Hi,

You could try using Commands, which is the typical way to define actions or operations that the user can perform through the UI, that will be processed in a view model.

You will find more information about this in the Prism documentation at MSDN:

  • Chapter 5: Implementing the MVVM Pattern, Commands
  • Chapter 9: Communicating Between Loosely Coupled Components, Solution Commanding

You could also find the In The Box MVVM Training by Karl Shifflett handy, as it provides a multi-media MVVM training that is consumed within Visual Studio 2010.

I hope you find this helpful.
